Title: Kinect Bing Map
Description: Kinect controller for Bing Map using WPF with MVVM design pattern.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Prototype app to test Kinect Interaction with v1.7 SDK with WPF using MVVM pattern.

Functions:
- Using two hands grip to zoom-in or zoom-out the map
- Using one hand to grab and drag the map
